title: Lisa Faulkner reveals second stunning bridal dress while John Torode opted for a grey wedding cake
text:
Lisa Faulkner and John Torode have given fans a further insight into their romantic countryside wedding with new snaps.

New posts show that the blushing bride, 47, donned a gown that was customisable to create two unique looks, with Lisa looking equally radiant in both.

And the first look at the couple's cake has also been revealed, which was no doubt one of the big factors for MasterChef Judge, John, 47.

Mixing things up: New posts show that the blushing bride, 47, donned a gown that was customisable to create two unique looks, with Lisa looking equally radiant in both.

In a picture shared by Lisa's sister Victoria, the blonde beauty dazzled in a second version of her glamorous gown.

For the ceremony, Lisa wore a stunning A-line satin wedding dress with a lace overlay on the bodice featuring capped sleeves and a high neck.

Yet, mixing things up for the reception, Lisa removed the lace trim to expose the gown's sweetheart neckline and spaghetti strap bodice.

Quirky: New snaps from the couple's big day also revealed their exquisite three-tiered wedding cake, a marbled sugar paste cake, breaking with tradition by opting for a grey cake

New snaps from the couple's big day also revealed their exquisite three-tiered wedding cake.

The newlyweds and their guests tucked into a marbled sugar paste cake, breaking with tradition by opting for a grey, not white, gateau.

The dessert also featured a sugar paste flower garland for decoration, and the couple's initials monogrammed on the centre.

First dance: Lisa and John tied the knot on Thursday at the swanky Aynhoe Park in Banbury in front of a host of their celebrity friends and family

Lisa and John tied the knot on Thursday at the swanky Aynhoe Park in Banbury in front of a host of their celebrity friends and family.

In one stunning snap, John and Lisa looked every inch the loved-up couple as they shared their first dance as man and wife.

Waltzing on the dazzling white dance floor surrounded by twinkling lights, the pair smiled lovingly at each other while surrounded by their family and friends.

Meanwhile, John jokingly shared a snap from the day before the wedding, in which he donned Lisa's cap from her bridal shower.

Alongside the fun image, he wrote: 'She even let me wear her crown the night before I married my wonderful girl.'

Fun times: Instagram images from the wedding show the happy couple having their first dance, while the Masterchef star donned the Bride cap worn by his blushing bride

Beautiful: Lisa Faulkner shared this stunning photo with 'my husband' John

Hat's life: Lisa also uploaded a snap in her bejeweled Bride cap, which had clearly done the rounds during the pair's rehearsal dinner the night before

Lisa also uploaded a snap in her bejeweled Bride cap, which had clearly done the rounds during the pair's rehearsal dinner the night before.

Looking sensational in a black sequinned gown, Lisa proudly rocked her fun hat in the photo, with which she captioned: 'The night before the wedding ..the hat that keeps on giving!!

'We had such a lovely dinner with all the fam and our nearest and dearest @aynhoepark. Can’t stop smiling.'

Other snaps from the star-studded bash show the couple sweetly holding hands as they exchanged their vows.

Touching moment: Other snaps from the star-studded bash show the couple sweetly holding hands as they exchanged their vows

While another sees the fun-loving pair larking around while they cut their stunning three-tiered marble cake.

Further showcasing their fun side, Lisa shared a picture of herself and John in their selfie, with the duo donning gigantic novelty sunglasses.

As well as her new husband, Lisa also posed up a storm with her best friends Nicola Stephenson and Angela Griffin.

While she also shared snaps from the morning of the wedding as she and her bridesmaids donned matching, personalised nightwear ahead of getting ready.

Celebrations: While another sees the fun-loving pair larking around while they cut their stunning three-tiered marble cake

Masters of disguise: Further showcasing their fun side, Lisa shared a picture of herself and John in their selfie, with the duo donning gigantic novelty sunglasses

Other guests at the big day included John's Masterchef co-star Gregg Wallace, as well as Tamzin Outhwaite and Amanda Holden.

Amanda, 48, was pictured putting on a brave face as she walked around in trainers after breaking her leg in two places while on holiday.

The TV star looked incredible in her chic pink dress but looked pretty down in the dumps as she tried to put on a brave face with her crutches in hand, before posing for snaps with former Corrie star Charlie Condou and actress Tamzin.

The pair, who have been dating since 2015, announced the proposal in an Instagram post earlier this year. Lisa wrote: 'My gorgeous John completely surprised me on Christmas Day and asked me to marry him!

Forever friends: As well as her new husband, Lisa also posed up a storm with her best friends Nicola Stephenson and Angela Griffin

Girlfriends: While she also shared snaps from the morning of the wedding as she and her bridesmaids donned matching, personalised nightwear ahead of getting ready

Bride-to-be: Lisa had a moment for her self ahead of her big day

'After waiting to tell our family when we got home we then had a few days just grinning at each other!! I'm so very happy to share our lovely news with you.

'Happy 2019 it’s going to be quite a year and I’m going to embrace every minute of it. All you need is love. Love is all you need.'

Earlier this month, the former EastEnders actress enjoyed a fun hen do at Soho Farmhouse with her pals - including Amanda, Angela and Tamzin Outhwaite.

The Holby City actress was feeling cheeky as she slipped into underwear to lark around in a bath before indulging in some cocktails and food at the upmarket venue.

Snap happy: BGT judge Amanda Holden hobbled to the ceremony in trainers as she joined Charlie Condou and Tamzin Outhwaite at the event

On Friday the couple shared the first official images of their big day.

Lisa captioned her image with the words: 'The happiest day of my life!!! Cue the wedding spam for the next few weeks! Apologies in advance.

'Yesterday I married the man of my dreams and we had the BEST Day EVER, filled with all our family and friends and such Love. Thank you we didn’t want to leave!'

John also shared a picture of himself lifting Lisa up in the air with an equally moving caption.

He wrote: 'Officially married the girl of my dreams yesterday @lisafaulknercooks what a day!! Thank you @aynhoepark photo courtesy of @jamesfearphotography.'

Lisa carried a beautiful bouquet with orange, brown and pink blooms and wore shoes which perfectly matched her dress. John looked incredibly smart, wearing a navy suit.

'Officially married the girl of my dreams': John and new wife Lisa shared the first pictures of their wedding on Instagram on Friday, a day after they married at Aynhoe Park in Banbury

Love: The couple accompanied their snaps with touching messages after sharing their wonderful day with family and friends
description: New posts show that the blushing bride, 47, donned a gown that was customisable to create two unique looks, with Lisa looking equally radiant in both, whilst John mixed things up with the cake.
